data.name: Seneca 7: A Cyberpunk Odyssey
data.detailed_description:
Seneca 7 is an open-ended alien world settlement ARPG!!! Promising to innovate yet keep intact the classic farm sim games appeal and fun, Seneca 7 aims to modernize and make the experience more story driven and inclusive. Through the setting and theme we will showcase amazing alien scenery and feature a large cast of diverse and quirky characters as we weave topics like cryptocurrency and environmental awareness into the core game loop — all the while keeping it an entertainingly good time.



Set in an alternate Earth in the not-so-distant future where nothing is regulated. This has caused humanity to kill it's only home. You've fortunately won the chance of a lifetime to be one of the first settlers to join Seneca 7, the earth's first settlement on an alien world lightyears from home. Armed with state of the art tools and a few crypto coins, you set out on an adventure to see if life on an alien world is possible. Can you learn to live off this unknown land and survive? Work together with the other settlers to learn everything you can and attempt to terraform this new world turning it into a thriving new home for humanity? It won't be easy though. As with this discovery of a hope brings the darkest out of the shadows as hidden threats loom over this new found Eden. But with the help of the other settlers and a little dedication to cultivating this new world, you might just be the one to save the settlement and secure the future for everyone on Earth!



There are way more than 7 settlers living in the settlement on Seneca 7. Coming from all walks of life, get to know these people by sparking up a dialogue who knows they might have an important mission to give you or request to join your adventuring party — extra respect points for giving gifts, just be sure its something they like!



Making your new life on an alien world is dangerous, that is why some settlers will always be there to lend their hands no matter the task! You will always have; Terrey Chavez, Jimmy Nova, Farmer John, m0-x1e, Rosy Kaboom and a few others as willing allies always available to join your party. Be sure to build meaningful relationships with the other settlers, who knows who is willing to brave outside the settlement by your side.





One of the corner stones of this genre is the getting to date and marry one of the settlers! In the spirit of inclusion we have characters that cover all spectrums of the rainbow! No matter your relationship preference you will find someone to love or tolerate within the settlement.







Don't worry just because you can't "bang" these settlers doesn't mean you should ignore them! As getting to know them and their past could unlock dark secrets or powerful items or even a new ally to use as a "human shield". So be sure to talk to and get to know everyone in the settlement. You never know who will be the one to save or end your life.







Upon your arrival to the settlement you will be greeted by the savior of humanity; Leon Muskrat himself! Were he personally notices something special about you and takes you to your very own home in the settlement! Here you will raise animals, grow crops, catch fish, cook up delicious meals, craft fantastic new gear and even customize your homestead to fit your chosen class and decor tastes.



After arriving to the settlement you will need to verify yourself with the information in the Seneca Settler Database. This will allow you to be able to fully customize your character by selecting on of your preferred cyberpunk themed races where each race has a smattering of customization options that fit that races aesthetics.
  • The Human.
  • The Mutant.
  • The Half-Mutant.
  • The Robot.
  • The Half-Robot.





Your previous life no longer matters and you get to be reborn into whatever class you want to pursue within the settlement. Each class has it's own divergent storyline tailored to the class's focused elements of gameplay for your enjoyment.
  • The combat hardened Soldier.
  • The super stealthy Explorer.
  • The nature loving Farmer.
  • The highly skilled Crafter.
  • The knowledge seeking MagiScientist.





Need help deciding what to do with your days and nights on Seneca 7?! Don't worry with our vibrant mission system you will always have something to do. Be it missions that take your through the main story, or missions designed specifically for your chosen class even missions that are generated with our RMG (Random Mission Generator) you will always have something to do...for someone else.



As you progress through seasons of Seneca 7, learning more about the settlement and this new alien world you come to discover a dark and twisted plot hidden deep beneath the surface of this new found utopia. You quickly find out your choices alone could impact the settlement offering multiple endings to be discovered. Will you strive for the brighter future or will you fall to its hidden corruption? The choice will be yours.





Get to know the other settlers to learn about their backstories and interests. The more you show interest into their lives the stronger your bonds will grow with them. If you create a strong enough bond you will soon gain allies that would give their life for yours or even fall madly in love with you. But be careful you could offend someone enough that they will become your arch-enemy and no one has time for that.





This game will function around an adventuring party system. Each day the player will be able to form a party to adventure with during the day, be it exploring new found alien ruins outside the settlement or just spending the day on the sandy shores. A players party will consist of one pet and three allies.



We all know why we play RPGs for the loot. We got you covered, with our equipment system you will be able to find amazing outfits, powerful weapons and super useful tools that can be upgraded, sold and traded!



Yeah buddy you get to be your favorite neuro-diverse cartoon star catching all the alien critters to become the Seneca 7 pet master...Explore the world of Seneca cataloging, capturing and battling all the alien critters out there.







Taking place on an alien world allows us to create environments, creatures and scenarios that you would never find in the standard genre of these games. So lets get cooky and wild. Who knows you might find hidden out there.



Under the hood Seneca 7 has it's own enriched game system; complete with races, stats, levels, and an offering 5 different classes each with their own abilities, skills and equipment. Additionally build up enough of a relationship with the other settlers in the town to create an adventuring party to explore the dangerous yet beautiful world of Seneca 7 earning experience and leveling up for that funtastic adventuring party vibe.



That is right! We are designing the game to allow couch coop for 2 (really tying to make 4 work) players to play and experience the story of the game together. And not some bulls**t slave to player one crap. Each player will be able to have their own story and choices.



Don't give a s**t about RPGs and just wanna focus on that A of the RPG and battle with your buddies? Don't worry 2-4 players can locally battle each other in an out-of-box pvp battle mode reminiscent to those fighting games we all grew up with.





Howdy Steamian,

If you read this far and still reading super sexy! The name is Posey and I am the leader of this rag tag bunch of indie game devs. We are currently developing this project in full transparency with the public through something we are calling Iterative Fishbowl Development, (go read the Early Access for more info). I know that sounds like some strange aquarium device but it isn't; it means that you, the consumer can anytime peak in and see what we are working on and be truly apart of the creation process...well as much apart of the creation process as you are at Krispy Kreme watching your hot-n-now dozen of doughnuts get made. Anywho enjoy the following words as much as I did writing them!

Seneca 7: A Cyberpunk Odyssey is an ARPG (Action Role Playing Game) centered around establishing a successful settlement on an alien planet through combat, exploration, farming, and resource management. Set in a newly discovered solar system lightyears from Earth, in this brave new world the settlers utilize Cryptocurrency, collect and trade NFTs, and rely on the Blockchain to handle their daily societal functions. What could possibly go wrong?

Neat Point One
The story will follow an exciting narrative that offers multiple branches of story, different game modes with tons of replayability, and a class system where you can develop characters to use in action-based combat while exploring the vast new world outside of the settlement, or maintain order within it to ensure its success! When it comes to this genre of game and the Crypto-space, generally you either already know it and participate in the space, or you don’t want anything to do with it. We’re here to disrupt that mindset and build a bridge between the Crypto-enthusiasts and gamers by making, selling, and playing an awesome game!

Neat Point Two
Mixing the intricacies of farming and resource management with combat and exploration! You can even have a pet and companions join you on your treks outside of the settlement! There will be plenty of vibrant vistas inspired by album covers, crazy alien creatures ready to tear you apart, and all within a cyberpunk sci-fi setting focused on how this world could differ from any version of Earth you’ve ever seen. A dystopia fueled by corporate greed with no rules save for one: MONEY = POWER or a true second chance for humanity.

Neat Point Three
Explore various options and worldviews in a divergent storyline. Multiple narrative threads and possible branches in your path gives you the freedom to tell your own story. How will you react to what you learn, and what will you do with the information you gather? Will you pursue a quiet life, or seek to change things for the better? Choose between peaceful days as a farmer and gatherer, or leave the settlement to go on crazy adventures! Hunt and fight using our combat system! No matter your play style, there’s a second life for you here.

Neat Point Four
Through this setting and its story, you’ll be able to learn about how cryptocurrency works, what the blockchain is, and why NFTs are so misused. Learn about the good, the bad, and the ugly of the industry through family friendly humor, and meet over 70 other settlers to form deep relationships and connections with them! Learn why they’re here, what they think of things, and how they’re handling their new lives in this alien settlement called Seneca 7.

Hurrah! You made it to the end...or the end for now! Till the next episode!

data.short_description: Seneca 7 is an action-packed cyberpunk reimagining of the classic farm sim games. Be who you want and make your new life as a settler - explore the unknown, fight strange creatures, farm the land, craft powerful items or discover ancient ruins all on a newly discovered alien world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics HD530
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9300H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650Q
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
